item.title: 投资者为何对黄金爱不释手？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 英国央行贝利对稳定币未来作用的怀疑态度有所缓和
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）周三表示对稳定币的态度较为温和，称数字货币可以推动支付领域的创新，并与当前的金融体系共存。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey signaled a softer approach toward stablecoins on Wednesday, saying that the digital currency could drive innovations in payments and co-exist with the current financial system.】

item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，马克-伯根（Mark Bergen）将从欧洲最新的军事技术聚会上发回一篇报道，因为政治气氛变得更加黑暗。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 特朗普对签证规则的拟议修改遭到芯片行业的抨击
item.description: 半导体行业领导人警告特朗普政府，拟议中的签证收紧规定有可能导致重要的人才库缩水，并破坏美国扩大芯片制造业的努力。【原文：Semiconductor industry leaders are warning the Trump administration that a proposed tightening of visa rules risks shrinking a vital talent pool and undermining efforts to expand chip manufacturing in the US.】

item.title: 布朗大学和西北大学捐赠基金转向二级市场
item.description: 布朗大学和西北大学的首席投资官们正在转向二级市场，为他们的私人资产寻求不断增加的流动性，尽管他们对定价仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Chief investment officers at Brown and Northwestern universities are turning to the secondary markets to tap into rising liquidity for their private assets, although they remain cautious over pricing.】

item.title: 印度央行行长认为收益率有下调空间，印度债券上涨
item.description: 印度储备银行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）发出收益率有下降空间的信号后，印度债券创下一个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Indian bonds rose by the most in a month after Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra signaled room for yields to fall.】

item.title: 三星与 SK Hynix 签订协议，为 OpenAI 的星际之门提供设备
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）和SK海力士公司（SK Hynix Co., Ltd.）已达成初步协议，向OpenAI的星际之门（Stargate）项目供应芯片和其他设备，这项交易有助于巩固它们在人工智能先进存储芯片领域的领先地位。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix Co. have forged initial agreements to supply chips and other gear to OpenAI’s Stargate project, a deal that helps shore up their lead in advanced memory chips for AI.】

item.title: 汽车供应商采埃孚削减成本，裁员 7,600 人
item.description: 采埃孚腓特烈港股份公司（ZF Friedrichshafen AG）将在其电气化传动系统部门裁减 7,600 个职位，因为这家德国汽车零部件制造商正在加大重组力度，以应对低迷的需求。【原文：ZF Friedrichshafen AG is cutting 7,600 positions at its electrified drivetrain division as the German car-parts maker steps up its restructuring efforts to deal with poor demand.】

item.title: 德国电网费用明年将下降 57%，以帮助降低电费
item.description: 在政府补贴的支持下，德国电网费用明年将下降 57%，这也是减轻家庭能源费用、提高国家工业竞争力的举措之一。【原文：German power-grid fees are set to drop 57% next year on the back of government subsidies, as part of a move to ease energy bills for households and make the country’s industries more competitive.】

item.title: PMI 显示捷豹路虎停产加剧英国工厂低迷
item.description: 由于捷豹路虎的工厂暂时停产，英国工厂的生产量出现了六个月来的最大幅度下降，使该行业雪上加霜。【原文：British factories suffered the sharpest decline in production for six months, as the temporary shutdown of Jaguar Land Rover’s factories added to the sector’s woes.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称私人市场常青树需求旺盛
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）全球客户覆盖主管伊丽莎白-丹尼斯（Elizabeth Dennis）表示，虽然个人投资者在很大程度上被排除在资产类别之外，但选择在私人市场获取回报的投资者对常青基金的需求很大。【原文：Evergreen funds are in high demand from investors opting for returns in private markets though individual investors stay largely excluded from the asset class, according to Elizabeth Dennis, Morgan Stanley’s global head of client coverage.】

item.title: 印度将向本地银行融资开放 400 亿美元的并购市场
item.description: 印度央行计划允许当地贷款机构为并购提供融资，此举有望推动该国价值 400 多亿美元的交易市场。【原文：India’s central bank plans to permit local lenders to finance mergers and acquisitions, a move expected to boost the country’s $40 billion-plus deals market.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩称政策宽松，支持将利率维持在 4% 的水平
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）周三在接受彭博电视采访时表示，相对于通胀和经济活动而言，英国的货币政策依然宽松。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann said that UK monetary policy remains loose relative to inflation and economic activity, speaking in an interview with Bloomberg TV Wednesday.】

item.title: 杂货店赌场和前首席执行官在巴黎市场滥用审判中面临巨额罚款风险
item.description: 让-查尔斯-纳乌里（Jean-Charles Naouri）和他领导了三十年的法国杂货商将于周三在巴黎受审，指控他合谋操纵 Casino Guichard Perrachon SA 的股价。【原文：Jean-Charles Naouri and the French grocer that he led for three decades will stand trial in Paris on Wednesday over allegations he conspired to manipulate Casino Guichard Perrachon SA’s stock price.】
